TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsThumbnail extends System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource

Docs.summary: Represents a thumbnail image of a document sequence, single document, or single page.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail> class has no public constructor. A reference to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail> is provided through the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods.
It is recommended that if any page in an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> has a thumbnail, that all pages be specified with thumbnails.
